Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.mobspawn

Class DropCreeper

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.mobspawn.BaseMobSpawn
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.mobspawn.DropCreeper
public class DropCreeper extends BaseMobSpawn
Event that spawns a Creeper near players. This event is classified as a negative event and spawns a single creeper that targets the nearest player. The creeper spawns from above and cannot spawn in water or lava.

  • Constructor Details

    • DropCreeper

      public DropCreeper()
      Constructs a new DropCreeper event with specific spawn settings. Initializes the event with: - 1 creeper per spawn - Spawn radius between 3 and 10 blocks horizontally - Vertical spawn range between 3 and 30 blocks - Individual spawning with 2-block spacing - Can spawn in air or on surfaces

  • Method Details

    • onMobSpawned

      protected void onMobSpawned(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Handles post-spawn setup for the creeper. Sets the spawned creeper to target the nearest player.
      Overrides:
      onMobSpawned in class BaseMobSpawn
      Parameters:
      entity - The spawned entity (creeper)
      player - The nearest player to target

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the creeper spawn event. Delegates to the parent class implementation.
      Overrides:
      execute in class BaseMobSpawn

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminates the creeper spawn event. Delegates to the parent class implementation.
